review: The doctors at PGI Chandigarh are incredibly skilled and caring. Dr. Sharma diagnosed my condition accurately and provided the best treatment. I am very grateful for their support.
I had a wonderful experience with Dr. Gupta at PGI. She took the time to explain everything and made sure I was comfortable throughout the process. Highly recommend!
Dr. Bhatia is one of the best doctors I have ever met. His expertise and dedication to his patients are commendable. The treatment I received at PGI Chandigarh was top-notch.
PGI Chandigarh has some of the finest doctors. Dr. Mehta's professionalism and kindness made my treatment process much easier. I'm really thankful for the care I received.
I was treated by Dr. Kapoor at PGI, and I couldn't have asked for better care. The entire team was very supportive and ensured that I was well-informed at every step.
Dr. Reddy at PGI Chandigarh is truly exceptional. He listened to all my concerns and provided effective treatment. The staff was also very polite and helpful.
My experience at PGI Chandigarh was excellent. Dr. Arora is a highly skilled doctor who provided great care. The hospital facilities are also very good.
